protein.specific_function: Acts as a cofactor for XPO1/CRM1-mediated nuclear export, perhaps as export complex scaffolding protein. Bound to XPO1/CRM1, stabilizes the XPO1/CRM1-cargo interaction. In the absence of Ran-bound GTP prevents binding of XPO1/CRM1 to the nuclear pore complex. Binds to CHC1/RCC1 and increases the guanine nucleotide exchange activity of CHC1/RCC1. Recruits XPO1/CRM1 to CHC1/RCC1 in a Ran-dependent manner

reference.reference_text: Mueller L, Cordes VC, Bischoff FR, Ponstingl H: Human RanBP3, a group of nuclear RanGTP binding proteins. FEBS Lett. 1998 May 15;427(3):330-6.
